tha-ap73:0.3_0: Here the most senior monk disciples in seniority,
tha-ap73:1.1_0: I’m now turned away with flowers
tha-ap73:2.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
tha-ap73:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap73:3.1_0: From here they are the fifteenth,
tha-ap73:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap73:4.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap73:4.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap73:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nāgasamāla.
tha-ap73:6.1_0: The senior monk with Nāgasamāla is first.
